{{Disambig}}

'''Seed''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== ''Item'' ===
Seeds that are grown on [[farmland]]:
* {{ItemLink|Wheat Seeds}}
* {{ItemLink|Melon Seeds}}
* {{ItemLink|Pumpkin Seeds}}
* {{ItemLink|Beetroot Seeds}}
* {{ItemLink|Torchflower Seeds}}
* {{ItemLink|Pitcher Pod|text=Pitcher Pods}}

Plants that function as their own seeds:
* {{ItemLink|Carrot|text=Carrots}} (grows on farmland)
* {{ItemLink|Potato|text=Potatoes}} (grows on farmland)
* {{ItemLink|Nether Wart}} (grows on [[soul sand]])
* {{ItemLink|Cocoa Beans}} (grows on [[jungle logs]])

=== World generation ===
* [[World seed]], the number used for world generation.
* [[Seed Templates]], a menu {{in|BE}} with a list of seeds (with captions) for the player to select from.

=== Command ===
* {{cmd|seed}}, the command which displays the world seed.{{only|java}}

== ''Minecraft Earth'' ==
* {{EntityLink|id=melon-seed-projectile|Melon Golem#Melon seed projectile|Melon Seed Projectile}}, a projectile shot by [[melon golem]]s
